  • Method Details

    • setBoard

      public void setBoard(int playerNumber)
      This method initializes the Board with the method setGrid( ) of the Board.
      Parameters:
      playerNumber - is the number of players in the game.

    • draw

      public boolean draw(int playerIndex, int n, int m)
      This method checks if an item in the coordinates [n;m] of the Board can be drawn by checking if the number of items is already saturated (max 3 item drawn each turn), if the item has already been drawn, if the item is selectable by game logic and if the item it's not an empty object ( item already draw in other turns ).
      Parameters:
      playerIndex - Index of the player in List player.
      n - is the Row of the board to draw the item_tile.
      m - is the Column of the board to draw the item_tile.
      Returns:
      True only if the draw is valid.

    • placeItem

      public boolean placeItem(int i, int m, int a, int b, int c)
      This method checks if the items in the draw pile of the player selected can be placed inside his bookshelf, if it can then it completes the placing and return true else it returns false.
      Parameters:
      i - is the index of the player List who asked to place the items
      m - is the column in which to place the items
      a - is the position of the first item to place
      b - is the position od the second item to place
      c - is the position of the third item to place
      Returns:
      true if the placing is successful or false if it's unsuccessful.

    • calculateScore

      public String calculateScore()
      This method calculate the score for each player in the game and finds the winner. The score in calculated by summing up the personal goal card score, the common goal card score and the adjacent item score. (the common goal card score is calculated in real time game while the personal goal and adjacent item score is calculated on the spot) After the score calculation the winner is return and stored in the winner attribute of the class.
      Returns:
      a string of the username of the winner.

    • resetDraw

      public void resetDraw(int playerIndex)
      This method resets the board on the state it was before the player made his first draw.
      Parameters:
      playerIndex - it's the player that made the last draw.
